mapper.sql: itemID, itemCode, PROJECT_NO, PROJECT_NAME, DISCIPLINE_CODE, DISCIPLINE_NAME, APPLICANT, COMPANY, POSTAL_ADDRESS, POSTAL_CODE, CONTACT_CODE, EMAIL, APPLICATION_DATE, STATUS, EXAMINE_STATUS, USER_CODE, CREATER, itemCreateAt, UPDATER, itemUpdateAt ,REASON

idt.itemID, idt.itemCode, idt.PROJECT_NO, idt.PROJECT_NAME, idt.DISCIPLINE_CODE, idt.DISCIPLINE_NAME, idt.APPLICANT, idt.COMPANY, idt.POSTAL_ADDRESS, idt.POSTAL_CODE, idt.CONTACT_CODE, idt.EMAIL, idt.APPLICATION_DATE, idt.STATUS, idt.EXAMINE_STATUS, idt.USER_CODE, idt.CREATER, idt.itemCreateAt, idt.UPDATER, idt.itemUpdateAt, idt.REASON
mapper.select: select status from tb_industrial_develop_topic where USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=CHAR} order by itemUpdateAt desc
SELECT * FROM tb_industrial_develop_topic LIMIT #{start},#{end} order by itemUpdateAt desc

SELECT
, cf.FILE_PATH, cf.FILE_NAME from tb_industrial_develop_topic idt left join tb_culpro_file cf on idt.itemCode = cf.DATA_CODE where
EXAMINE_STATUS in (4,6,7)
EXAMINE_STATUS in (2,4,5,6,7)
order by idt.itemUpdateAt desc

select
from tb_industrial_develop_topic where itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR} order by itemUpdateAt desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_industrial_develop_topic (itemID, itemCode, PROJECT_NO,PROJECT_NAME, DISCIPLINE_CODE, DISCIPLINE_NAME, APPLICANT, COMPANY, POSTAL_ADDRESS, POSTAL_CODE, CONTACT_CODE, EMAIL, APPLICATION_DATE, STATUS, EXAMINE_STATUS, USER_CODE, CREATER, itemCreateAt, UPDATER, itemUpdateAt, REASON) values (#{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disciplineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disciplineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postalAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examineStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update tb_industrial_develop_topic
PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISCIPLINE_CODE = #{disciplineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISCIPLINE_NAME = #{disciplineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLICANT = #{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTAL_ADDRESS = #{postalAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTAL_CODE = #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_CODE = #{contactCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLICATION_DATE = #{applicationDate,jdbcType=DATE},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXAMINE_STATUS = #{examineStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemCreateAt = #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemUpdateAt = #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tb_industrial_develop_topic set PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISCIPLINE_CODE = #{disciplineCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISCIPLINE_NAME = #{disciplineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLICANT = #{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTAL_ADDRESS = #{postalAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTAL_CODE = #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_CODE = #{contactCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLICATION_DATE = #{applicationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXAMINE_STATUS = #{examineStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemCreateAt = #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemUpdateAt = #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
, cf.FILE_PATH, cf.FILE_NAME from tb_industrial_develop_topic idt left join tb_culpro_file cf on idt.itemCode = cf.DATA_CODE where USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=CHAR} order by idt.itemUpdateAt desc

SELECT
, cf.FILE_PATH, cf.FILE_NAME from tb_industrial_develop_topic idt left join tb_culpro_file cf on idt.itemCode = cf.DATA_CODE where COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=CHAR} and EXAMINE_STATUS in("1","2","3","4","5","6","7") order by idt.itemUpdateAt desc

SELECT
FROM tb_industrial_develop_topic where PROJECT_NO = (select MAX(PROJECT_NO) FROM tb_industrial_develop_topic where PROJECT_NO!="——") order by itemUpdateAt desc

SELECT
FROM tb_industrial_develop_topic WHERE EXAMINE_STATUS = #{examineStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by itemUpdateAt desc
